title: [SOLVED]820-2936-b no thunderbolt
message: Board had a little liquid damage. Thunderbolt is not working.

title: [SOLVED]820-2936-b no thunderbolt
message: Please just leave it, this is a nightmare.

title: [SOLVED]820-2936-b no thunderbolt
message: I was not totally accurate. Thunderbolt is working but image is distorted etc. Still no chance to fix it?

title: [SOLVED]820-2936-b no thunderbolt
message: Picture distorts and blinks. But I tried flexing the cable and found a position where it works correctly. So this looks like a contact issue. It is possible to change the thunderbolt connector?

title: [SOLVED]820-2936-b no thunderbolt
message: Sure, it is a bit of a bitch but possible.

title: [SOLVED]820-2936-b no thunderbolt
message: We chang the thunderbol connector and everything good! Thank you!
